title: RaidersSphere4th
notes:
- The game is unplayable with the "Shader Settings" on. It appears an "Effect error" message with gibberish text. Otherwise, the game loads well.
- The game won't show text whatsoever.
- The 3D effects are unstable, making the gaming very unconfortable. Furthermore, if you minimize, some controls will be disabled, making the game unplayable.
Runs fine. Turning on shader settings causes a crash on start. No text is displayed, making the game effectively unplayable. Controller works.
title: RaidersSphere4th
